message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't accept $750,000.  This product is very valuable, and I know its worth. How about we meet in the middle at $900,000?

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $900,000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $750,000 and $900,000, so I'll offer $825,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
